summary: Completed testing of GridWise Model Training feature. Backend APIs fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend-backend integration blocked by API URL configuration issue.

integration_issues.issue: Frontend not using REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL environment variable - still making requests to external URL instead of localhost
integration_issues.impact: Prevents all API calls from working, blocking Model Training feature testing

passed_tests: Gradient Boosting and Random Forest algorithm training
Wind and Solar model training with metrics
Frontend UI components (Model Training section, algorithm selector, Train Models button)
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Wind, Solar, Machines, Performance)
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend API URL configuration. The frontend is not using the REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL environment variable correctly. Despite setting 'const API_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL || '';' in App.js, the frontend continues to make requests to the external URL instead of localhost. This prevents all API integration testing. Possible solutions: 1) Check React build configuration, 2) Verify environment variable loading, 3) Clear build cache completely, 4) Check for hardcoded URLs elsewhere in the code.

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All Model Training APIs working perfectly
success_percentage.frontend: 50% - UI components functional but API integration broken
